ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ The Frank Znort Quartet is its own unique universe and Oslo's unpolished pearl of a treasure. With its life-affirming approach to music genres, songs, people, and generally fantastic atmosphere, this big band has stood in the storm to play free live shows for you every Sunday since 1998. (25 years!!)
Every Sunday, BLÃ… and the Frank Znort Quartet gives you peace, love, freedom, and a great place to listen to live music and have some Sunday night drinks with your friends. They don't carry the slogan We Fuck Up Your Mondays! for nothing - we'll see you in the front row! ğŸ’™

CLUB:
Still hungry for some late-night tunes at your favorite nightclub? Every Sunday, Frank Znort invites their favorite DJs to play funky tunes all night. Hang out, dance, and have some drinks with the band. Who needs Mondays anyways..
